name: Inktrospective
description:
This game was created for GGJ 2022 - NL, within 48 hours.

A surreal platformer about looking inwards and coming to terms with the restlessness brought about by the human condition. Dive between a perfect and a broken world to reconcile your reality.

The team:

Art:
 Alex Out ( Environment art, Concept art )
Olivier Dral ( VFX, Tech art, System Design, QA )
 Vassil Mihaylov ( Environment art, Concept art )
 Reina H. ( Textures, Concept art, UI )

Design:
 Frits de Laat ( Level design, System design, QA )
 Xan Hisam ( Narrative design, System design )
 Jeroen Visscher ( System design, UI/UX design )
 Luca Yavuzok ( System design )
 Tim Raaijmakers ( System design )

Audio:
 Salvati ( Audio )

Controls:

Walking - A & D
Dash - Left Shift
Ground pound - E
Grapple - Q
